function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differential impact on different social groups due to VBDs transmission","Impact":"Increased vulnerability and exposure for marginalized groups","Mitigation":"Targeted intervention and outreach programs for marginalized groups","Technologies":"Community-based interventions, education programs","People":"Migrants, ethnic minorities, women, children","Owner":"Community health groups, schoolteachers, primary health care providers"},{"Description":"Limited access to government outreach programs and socio-economic development opportunities for women","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to VBDs and lack of access to health resources","Mitigation":"Policy changes to increase access, targeted health programs for women","Technologies":"Government policy changes, targeted health programs","People":"Women, children","Owner":"Government, health organizations"},{"Description":"Vulnerable children under 5 and pregnant women at heightened risk of VBDs","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria and other VBDs for women and children","Mitigation":"Initiatives aimed at identifying and managing VBDs in women and children","Technologies":"Health programs, disease management initiatives","People":"Children under 5, pregnant women","Owner":"Health organizations, governments"}]}
